subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Rubens Barrichello picked up his second victory in three races, edging his teammate Jenson Button, to lead a Brawn GP 1-2 at the Italian Grand Prix on Sunday.
snippet: Rubens Barrichello picked up his second victory in three races, edging his teammate Jenson Button, to lead a Brawn GP 1-2 at the Italian Grand Prix on Sunday.
